answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Since your sister has temperature fluctuations the first things to be ruled out are thyroid disorders, adrenal gland problems, anemia, diabetes, hypoglycemia, liver disease (this she has), low Vit B12, and vasovagal attacks.Do discuss this with your sister’s doctor. Take care!

question: My sister is hospitalized and the Doctors can't figure out what's wrong. She has been diagnosed with liver disease which they feel is a result of long term use of methatrexate (prescribed) found a gallstone 3cm.fluid around the heart and lungs, they are doing a lung biopsy today. No pneumonia, no influenza,  what the heck are the possibilities here?
